title: Add solr-lucene-memory and solr-lucene-misc jars to maven repository
description: Since solr-lucene-memory and solr-lucene-misc jars were added to the distribution (see SOLR-804) it would make sense to add them to maven repository as well.

comments.author: Igor Motov
comments.content: The patch that adds solr-lucene-misc and solr-lucene-memory to maven repository.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: SPRING_CLEANING_2013 JIRAS. Steve has been keeping maven up to date, assuming this is fixed.
